solution_line_template: First figure out how long both color coats will take to dry: {drying_time_per_color_coat} minutes * {num_color_coats} = <<{drying_time_per_color_coat}*{num_color_coats}={total_color_coat_drying_time}>>{total_color_coat_drying_time} minutes

Then add up the time for the base coat, top coat, and color coats: {total_color_coat_drying_time} minutes + {base_coat_drying_time} minutes + {top_coat_drying_time} minutes = <<{total_color_coat_drying_time}+{base_coat_drying_time}+{top_coat_drying_time}={total_drying_time}>>{total_drying_time} minutes
